sn47.49:1.3: Sukha vedana, dukkha vedana, adukkhamasukha vedana—
sn47.49:1.5: Imasam kho, bhikkhave, tissannam vedananam parinnaya cattaro satipatthana bhavetabba.
sn47.49:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn47.49:2.5: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.49:2.6: Imasam kho, bhikkhave, tissannam vedananam parinnaya ime cattaro satipatthana bhavetabba”ti.
